description:
Leading development of customer-facing web applications and internal tools using modern web technologies.

• Architected and implemented scalable frontend solutions serving 100K+ daily active users
• Mentored a team of 5 junior developers and established coding standards and best practices
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams (design, product, QA) to deliver features on time
• Reduced application load time by 50% through performance optimization and code splitting
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

Developed and maintained the company's main SaaS product from MVP to production, handling both frontend and backend development.

• Built RESTful APIs and designed database schemas for scalable data storage
• Implemented responsive UI components using React and modern CSS frameworks
• Optimized application performance, reducing load time by 40% and improving user experience
• Integrated third-party services including payment processing and email notifications
• Participated in code reviews and contributed to technical decision-making

Created interactive web experiences and custom solutions for various client projects.

• Developed custom WordPress themes and plugins for client websites
• Implemented pixel-perfect designs with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
• Collaborated closely with designers to ensure design consistency and brand guidelines
• Built responsive layouts that work seamlessly across all devices and browsers
• Maintained and updated existing client websites with new features and bug fixes

Worked independently on various web development projects for small businesses and startups.

• Developed custom websites and web applications for clients
• Provided technical consulting and recommendations for technology stack choices
• Managed project timelines and client communications
• Delivered projects on time and within budget
